credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Thetis observing Vulcan fabricating the arms of Achilles
medium: Pen and brown ink with brown wash (iron gall ink)
description: In an octagon Vulcan kneeling in the right foreground, raises the hammer; he holds a blade with a tongs. Mars and Minerva standing at left, look on.  Cupid raises one of the thunderbolts with his right hand, and holds another in his lowered left hand.
name: Drawing
